overview: After watching the film Nu Hon Than Chet (Kiss of the Death), a dreamy clumsy high-school girl, An, wishes that she can meet a Prince Reaper that helps her to complete her dream. As her wish, An runs into this Teen Reaper. However, he's such a clumsy Reaper that he creates a lot of trouble for An. Instead of being rescued, An has to "save" this Teen Reaper's life.
title: Saving the Death
